name: study1-fs
title: Dataset for DataTools4Heart project clinical study 1
description: Dataset for DataTools4Heart project clinical study 1

entity.name: pid
entity.description: A unique identifier assigned to each patient in the cohort.

entity.name: encounterId
entity.description: A unique identifier for each hospital encounter.

sampling.description: Use the end time of encounters as the reference time point.

feature.name: gender
feature.description: Gender of the patient

feature.name: age
feature.description: Age of the patient at reference point

feature.name: encounterClass
feature.description: Type of encounter (emergency, impatient, outpatient, etc)

feature.name: admissionYear
feature.description: Year of admission to hospital

feature.name: lengthOfStay
feature.description: The total number of days the patient has been hospitalized.

feature.name: admissionDate
feature.description: Date of hospital admission.

feature.name: dischargeDate
feature.description: Date of hospital discharge.

filter.name: beforeAdmission
filter.description: Filter the vital signs observed before the admission.

pivot.name: codes
pivot.description: Vital signs collected in an encounter

feature.name: value
feature.description: Value of the vital sign

pivot.name: codes
pivot.description: Vital signs collected in an encounter

feature.name: value
feature.description: Value of the vital sign

pivot.name: codes
pivot.description: Vital signs collected in an encounter

feature.name: value
feature.description: Value of the vital sign

pivot.name: codes
pivot.description: Important lab results to be evaluated features

feature.name: value
feature.description: Value of the lab result

filter.name: firstTwentyFourHours
filter.description: Filters symptoms that appeared within the first 24 hours of hospital admission.

pivot.name: code
pivot.description: Symptoms to be evaluated as features

feature.name: display
feature.description: Whether the symptom is observed or not

feature.name: lvef
feature.description: Value of left ventricular ejection fraction

feature.name: ecg_qrs_duration
feature.description: Duration of QRS wave

feature.name: ecg_qrs_axis
feature.description: Axis of QRS wave

feature.name: ecg_qt_duration_corrected
feature.description: Duration of QT wave corrected

feature.name: ecg_st
feature.description: ST-elevation

feature.name: ecg_ischemia_without_st
feature.description: Ischemia without st-elevation

feature.name: ecg_type_of_rhythm
feature.description: Type of rhythm

feature.name: smoker
feature.description: Determines if the patient is currently smoking. A patient is considered a current smoker if their last recorded smoking status is one of the following: 'Current every day smoker,' 'Current some day smoker,' 'Smoker, current status unknown,' 'Current heavy tobacco smoker,' or 'Current light tobacco smoker' and either has no recorded end date or the end date is after the reference time point. If the last recorded status is 'Former smoker' and it has an end date before the reference time point, the patient is considered a current smoker. If the status is 'Unknown if ever smoked,' the result is empty; otherwise, the patient is considered a non-smoker.

value.path: iif((code = '449868002' or code = '428041000124106' or code = '77176002' or code = '230063004' or code = '230060001') and (endTime.exists().not() or endTime > %referenceTimePoint),true,iif(code = '8517006' and endTime.exists() and endTime < %referenceTimePoint,true,iif(code = '266927001',{},false)))

feature.name: formerSmoker
feature.description: Whether the patient smoked within 1 year prior to the admission end.The patient is considered to have smoked if their most recent smoking status is 'Current every day smoker,' 'Current some day smoker,' 'Smoker, current status unknown,' 'Current heavy tobacco smoker,' or 'Current light tobacco smoker' and either: 1. The recorded start date is within 365 days of the reference time point, 2. There is no recorded end date, or 3. The recorded end date is within 365 days of the reference time point. If the last recorded status is 'Former smoker,' the patient is considered to have smoked in the past year if either the smoking start date is within 365 days of the reference time point or the smoking end date is before the reference time point. If the status is 'Unknown if ever smoked,' the result is empty; otherwise, the patient is considered a non-smoker.

value.path: iif(code = '449868002' or code = '428041000124106' or code = '77176002' or code = '230063004' or code = '230060001',iif(utl:getPeriod(startTime, %referenceTimePoint, 'days').toInteger() <= 365 or endTime.exists().not() or utl:getPeriod(endTime, %referenceTimePoint, 'days').toInteger() <= 365,true, false),iif(code = '8517006' and ((startTime.exists() and utl:getPeriod(startTime, %referenceTimePoint, 'days').toInteger() < 365) or (endTime.exists() and endTime < %referenceTimePoint)), true,iif(code = '266927001',{},false)))

feature.name: totalSmokingDuration
feature.description: Total duration of smoking in days.

feature.name: startTime
feature.description: Total number of smoking periods.

feature.name: nyha
feature.description: New York Heart Assessment value

feature.name: categorizedValue
feature.description: Severity of hyperkalemia

feature.name: categorizedValue
feature.description: Severity of chronic kidney disease

filter.name: heartFailure
filter.filter: icd10Codes.select($this.startsWith('I50') or $this.startsWith('I11.0') or $this.startsWith('I13.0') or $this.startsWith('I13.2') or $this.startsWith('I26.0') or $this.startsWith('I09.81') or $this.startsWith('I97.13')).anyTrue()

feature.name: timeFromEarliest
feature.description: Time elapsed (in months) since heart failure is observed for the first time until the reference time point.

filter.name: betweenHospitalAdmissionAndDischargeTime
filter.description: Filters conditions that occurred within the hospital admission and discharge timeframe.

feature.name: ap
feature.description: Whether the patient has angina pectoris in their clinical history prior to the date of the data point (i.e. the reference time point)

feature.name: af
feature.description: Whether the patient has atrial fibrillation in their clinical history prior to the date of the data point (i.e. the reference time point)

feature.name: cm
feature.description: Whether the patient has cardiomyopathy in their clinical history prior to the date of the data point (i.e. the reference time point)

feature.name: dysl
feature.description: Whether the patient has dyslipidemia in their clinical history prior to the date of the data point (i.e. the reference time point)

feature.name: hf
feature.description: Whether the patient has heart failure in their clinical history prior to the date of the data point (i.e. the reference time point)

value.path: icd10Codes.select($this.startsWith('I50') or $this.startsWith('I11.0') or $this.startsWith('I13.0') or $this.startsWith('I13.2') or $this.startsWith('I26.0') or $this.startsWith('I09.81') or $this.startsWith('I97.13')).anyTrue()

feature.name: diuretics
feature.description: Whether diuretics administered.

value.path: medicationGroups.select($this = 'Diuretics').anyTrue() or (medicationCodes.select($this.startsWith('C03BA82')).allFalse() and medicationCodes.select($this.startsWith('C03A') or $this.startsWith('C03D') or $this.startsWith('C03E') or $this.startsWith('C03XA') or $this.startsWith('C03BA') or $this.startsWith('C03BB') or $this.startsWith('C03CA') or $this.startsWith('C03CB') or $this.startsWith('C03CC') or $this.startsWith('C03CX') or $this.startsWith('C07BA') or $this.startsWith('C07BB') or $this.startsWith('C07CA') or $this.startsWith('C07CB') or $this.startsWith('C07CG') or $this.startsWith('C07DZ') or $this.startsWith('C07DB') or $this.startsWith('C08GA') or $this.startsWith('C09BA') or $this.startsWith('C09BX') or $this.startsWith('C09DA') or $this.startsWith('C09DX') or $this.startsWith('C02LA') or $this.startsWith('C02LB') or $this.startsWith('C02LC') or $this.startsWith('C02LG') or $this.startsWith('C02LK') or $this.startsWith('C02LL') or $this.startsWith('C02LX')).anyTrue())

feature.name: diuretics_loop
feature.description: Whether Loop diuretics administered.

feature.name: anti_coag
feature.description: Whether anticoagulant agents administered.

value.path: medicationGroups.select($this = 'OAC').anyTrue() or (medicationCodes.select($this.startsWith('BO1AA') or $this.startsWith('BO1AB') or $this.startsWith('BO1AX04') or $this.startsWith('BO1AX05') or $this.startsWith('BO1AF') or $this.startsWith('BO1AE') or $this.startsWith('BO1AX01') or $this.startsWith('BO1AD12') or $this.startsWith('BO1AB02')).anyTrue())

feature.name: anti_plat
feature.description: Whether antiplatelet agents administered.

value.path: medicationCodes.select($this.startsWith('BO1AC13') or $this.startsWith('BO1AC17') or $this.startsWith('BO1AC16') or $this.startsWith('BO1AC04') or $this.startsWith('BO1AC22') or $this.startsWith('BO1AC05') or $this.startsWith('BO1AC25') or $this.startsWith('BO1AC24') or $this.startsWith('BO1AC19') or $this.startsWith('BO1AC11') or $this.startsWith('BO1AC21') or $this.startsWith('BO1AC06') or $this.startsWith('BO1AC15') or $this.startsWith('BO1AC08') or $this.startsWith('BO1AC10') or $this.startsWith('BO1AC18') or $this.startsWith('BO1AC07') or $this.startsWith('BO1AC03') or $this.startsWith('BO1AC23') or $this.startsWith('BO1AC01') or $this.startsWith('BO1AC02') or $this.startsWith('BO1AC26')).anyTrue()

feature.name: thrombolytic
feature.description: Whether thrombolytic drugs/fibrinolytics administered.

value.path: medicationCodes.select($this.startsWith('BO1AD02') or $this.startsWith('BO1AD07') or $this.startsWith('BO1AD11') or $this.startsWith('BO1AD08') or $this.startsWith('BO1AD04') or $this.startsWith('BO1AD03') or $this.startsWith('BO1AD01') or $this.startsWith('BO1AD09') or $this.startsWith('BO1AD06') or $this.startsWith('BO1AD05')).anyTrue()

feature.name: bb
feature.description: Whether beta blockers administered.

feature.name: ccb
feature.description: Whether calcium channel blockers administered.

feature.name: digitalis
feature.description: Whether digitalis glycosides administered.

feature.name: antiarrhytmic
feature.description: Whether antiarrhythmic drugs administered.

feature.name: inotropes
feature.description: Whether inotropes administered.

feature.name: vasodil
feature.description: Whether vasodil administered.

feature.name: platelet
feature.description: Whether platelet administered.

feature.name: ll
feature.description: Whether ll administered.

value.path: medicationGroups.select($this = 'Statins').anyTrue() or (medicationCodes.select($this.startsWith('C10AA') or $this.startsWith('C10BA') or $this.startsWith('C10BX') or $this.startsWith('C10AX13') or $this.startsWith('C10AX14') or $this.startsWith('C10AC16') or $this.startsWith('C10AX09')).anyTrue())

feature.name: ivabradine
feature.description: Whether ivabradine administered.

feature.name: potassium_binders
feature.description: Whether potassium_binders administered.

feature.name: insulins
feature.description: Whether insulins and analogs administered.

feature.name: oral_antidiabetic
feature.description: Whether oral_antidiabetic administered.

value.path: medicationGroups.select($this = 'SGLT2I').anyTrue() or (medicationCodes.select($this.startsWith('A10BA') or $this.startsWith('A10BB') or $this.startsWith('A10BG') or $this.startsWith('A10BF') or $this.startsWith('A10BH') or $this.startsWith('A10BJ') or $this.startsWith('A10BD') or $this.startsWith('A10BX09') or $this.startsWith('A10BK01') or $this.startsWith('A10BX12') or $this.startsWith('A10BK03')).anyTrue())

feature.name: ari
feature.description: Whether ari (drugs to prevent nerve damage in diabetes) administered.

feature.name: rdoad
feature.description: Whether respiratory drugs for obstructive airway diseases, inhalants administered.

feature.name: rdoad_syst
feature.description: Whether respiratory drugs for obstructive airway diseases, systemic use administered.

feature.name: cortico_syst
feature.description: Whether corticosteroids systemic administered.

feature.name: antiinfl
feature.description: Whether anti-inflammatory drugs administered.

feature.name: heartFailure
feature.description: Whether the patient is hospitalized because of heart failure after the reference time point.

feature.name: number_of_days_to_rehosp_for_heart_failure
feature.description: Number of days from reference time point until rehospitalization due to heart failure

feature.name: CV_Disease
feature.description: Whether the patient is hospitalized because of any cardiovascular condition after the reference time point.

feature.name: number_of_days_to_rehosp_for_CV
feature.description: Number of days from reference time point until rehospitalization due to CV disease

feature.name: non_CV_Disease
feature.description: Whether the patient is hospitalized because of any non-cardiovascular condition after the reference time point.

feature.name: number_of_days_to_rehosp_for_non_CV
feature.description: Number of days from reference time point until rehospitalization due to non-CV disease

feature.name: renal_complications
feature.description: Whether the patient is hospitalized because of any renal complication after the reference time point.

feature.name: number_of_days_to_rehosp_for_renal_complications
feature.description: Number of days from reference time point until rehospitalization due to renal complications

feature.name: isCardiovascular
feature.description: Whether the patient dies because of any cardiovascular condition after the reference time point.

feature.name: number_of_days_to_death_for_CV
feature.description: Number of days from reference time point until death due to CV disease

feature.name: isRenal
feature.description: Whether the patient dies because of any renal complication after the reference time point.

feature.name: number_of_days_to_death_for_renal
feature.description: Number of days from reference time point until death due to renal complications

filter.name: isNonRenalAndNonCV
filter.filter: causesOfDeath.select($this.startsWith('R99')).allFalse() and causesOfDeath.select($this.startsWith('N18') or $this.startsWith('N19')).allFalse() and causesOfDeath.select($this.startsWith('I') or $this.startsWith('G45') or $this.startsWith('J81') or $this.startsWith('K76.1') or $this.startsWith('R57')).allFalse()

feature.name: isNonRenalAndNonCV
feature.description: Whether the patient dies because of any non-cardiovascular and non-renal condition after the reference time point.

feature.name: number_of_days_to_death_for_non_renal_and_non_CV
feature.description: Number of days from reference time point until death due to non-CV and non-renal complications

feature.name: isAllCause
feature.description: Whether the patient dies because of unspecified condition after the reference time point..

feature.name: number_of_days_to_death_for_all_cause
feature.description: Number of days from reference time point until death due to unspecified condition
